sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Chicago Land Cession Act.

sections.heading: Jurisdiction of the State of Illinois over said lands is
sections.text:
hereby ceded to the United States, subject, however, to the right of the
state and any and all officers under its authority to serve and execute
on said lands any civil or criminal process issued under the authority
of the State of Illinois or any officer thereof, in the same manner as
if jurisdiction had not been ceded to the United States.
